summary: Companies operating in Egypt continue to make oil and gas discoveries and drill new wells at the start of the year, further boosting hydrocarbon production as the North African country looks to reduce import dependence. title: Cut Through the Noise and Invest Based on the Underlying Theme of Trump’s Energy
summary: Over the last week or so, crude oil futures have been volatile, with a sharp run up to over $62, followed by a dramatic dip back below $60. title: OPEC Boosts Oil Exports to India as Russian Flows Slump
summary: The share of OPEC crude oil in India’s import mix surged to the highest in 11 months in December as Russian shipments dropped to the lowest in two years on the latest U.S. sanctions. title: Mitsubishi Bets Big on U.S. Gas With $5.2 Billion Haynesville Deal
summary: Mitsubishi has struck a deal with Aethon to buy assets worth $5.2 billion in Texas and Louisiana in what would be the largest Japanese investment in U.S. natural gas production to date.
